ComicInfo.Penciller: Brendan McCarthy,Brett Ewins,C. Ezquerra,Carlos Ezquerra,John Higgins,Kevin O'Neill,McCarthy,Robin Smith
ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson fights Gargarax but it may be to late to save Hammy Blish.
Warriors from the Karbongian Empire are told to go out and pillage until they reach the edge of the universe.
A robot Judge Dredd thinks he is the real Judge Dredd.
Micky Swift is attacked by Todds, looking for meat for Mister Sweeney and he learns he can levitate.
ComicInfo.Tags: Bad City Blue,Johnny Alpha,Judge Anderson,Judge Dredd,Judges of Mega-City One,Max Bubba,Mega-City One,Micky Swift,Psi-Division,Strontium Dogs
ComicInfo.Title: The Possessed, Part 7: She Will Never Return!; Bad City Blue, Part 7; The Last Rumble of the Platinum Horde!; The Law According To Judge Dredd, Part 1; Rage, Part 6; Sooner or Later, Part 7
